text: (Unhein batao ke) humne jo Rasool bhi bheja hai isi liye bheja hai ke izn e khudawandi (by the leave of Allah) ki bina par uski itaat ki jaye, agar unhone yeh tareeqa ikhtiyar kiya hota ke jab yeh apne nafs par zulm kar baithey thay to tumhare paas aa jatey aur Allah se maafi maangte, aur Rasool bhi unke liye maafi ki darkhwast karta, to yaqeenan Allah ko bakshne wala aur reham karne wala paatey
